description: This is an HTML file that serves as the front-end interface for a database visualizer web application. It includes styling and client-side JavaScript to list databases, tables, and display table data dynamically fetched from backend API endpoints.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading the database data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables and loads table data on selection.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders a data table with rows and columns, including handling for wide content and object data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell based on data type and length, including clickable for large or object data.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects for better view.
